alert.note: Alert for Habersham; Rabun (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 3:19PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Habersham, Rabun and northwestern Oconee Counties through 345 PM EST... At 319 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northwest of Clarkesville, or 5 miles southwest of Lake Burton, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clayton, Westminster, Mountain City, Tiger, Tallulah Falls, Lake Rabun, Lake Burton, Lakemont, Tallulah Gorge State Park and Oconee State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
